currentCourses.chinese-intro:
培养学生掌握数据结构和算法的设计分析技术，提高程序设计的质量，根据所求解问题的性质选择合理的数据结构并对时间空间复杂性进行必要的控制。使得学生在将来的学习、研究和工作中，具备设计和实现高效的数据结构和算法的能力。
本课程方案的基本设计原则可以概括为以下三个方面：
（1）强调基础数据结构与算法的训练，从问题求解的角度，培养学生运用数据结构和算法基本理论来分析和解决问题的能力。
（2）注重实践能力和工程能力的培养，使得学生遵从软件开发的规范性，并建立起数据结构与算法设计和问题求解的知识体系。
主要的关注点，是数据知识与算法知识体系以及问题求解的计算思维能力。课程的重点：从广度和深度上把握数据结构与算法的知识体系，了解基本数据结构和经典算法，掌握理论、抽象和设计方法。课程的难点：问题抽象、算法抽象、数据结构抽象等数学抽象能力的培养；树和图结构中搜索和回溯思想；排序等算法的时空效率分析和权衡；检索和索引的效率；AVL、伸展树、红黑树等平衡树、B/B+树等数据结构中的平衡问题；根据实际问题，选择合适的数据模型，设计合适的算法，运用所学理论知识来求解；各种数据结构和算法在学科前沿中的应用和发展。
针对上述重点和难点，本课程从理论、抽象和设计的三个层次展开数据结构与算法教学，注重数据结构基本概念和抽象数据类型表述，使得学生可以在不同的设计阶段采用不同的抽象数据类型作为设计的基础，在适当的抽象层次上考虑程序的结构和算法。对每种数据结构都从其数学特性入手，先介绍其抽象数据类型；再讨论其不同的存储方法，与学生一起讨论研究不同存储实现下的可能算法；然后结合算法分析来讨论各种存储方法和算法的利弊，摒弃那些不适宜的方法。这样，充分调动学生主动学习的积极性，使得学生学到数据结构与算法所涉及的计算思维方法。
currentCourses.english-intro:
Understand principles and theories of Data Structures and Algorithms; complexity analysis and tradeoff, able to design and implement efficient and effective data structures and algorithms to solve problems.
Covers programming, data structures, and algorithm analysis. 
Topics include the organization and implementation of fundamental data structures such as list, binary tree, tree and forest, graph; the efficient sorting and searching algorithms; complexity analysis and tradeoff; data abstraction and problem solving.
currentCourses.name: 数据结构与算法 (A)

currentCourses.chinese-intro: 本课程主要面向智能方向的本科生，介绍计算机视觉的基本概念、方法和应用。计算机视觉是人工智能的一个重要分支，它的目标是使计算机具有“看”的能力，即从图像或视频中获取信息。本课程涉及的内容主要包含三个方面：第一部分介绍图像处理与特征提取的基本概念和方法，包括图像的基本操作、边缘检测、特征提取、特征匹配等；第二部分介绍三维重建与多视角几何的基本概念和方法，包括相机模型、立体视觉、三维重建等；第三部分介绍深度学习在计算机视觉中的应用，包括卷积神经网络、循环神经网络、生成对抗网络等。本课程旨在帮助学生掌握计算机视觉的基本理论和方法，培养学生的计算机视觉分析和应用能力。
currentCourses.english-intro:
This course is primarily intended for undergraduate students in the field of intelligence and introduces the fundamental concepts, methods, and applications of computer vision. Computer vision is an important branch of artificial intelligence, aiming to enable computers to "see"—that is, to extract information from images or videos.  

The course covers three main areas:

1. The first part introduces basic concepts and methods of image processing and feature extraction, including basic image operations, edge detection, feature extraction, and feature matching.
2. The second part covers the fundamentals of 3D reconstruction and multi-view geometry, including camera models, stereo vision, and 3D reconstruction.
3. The third part focuses on the application of deep learning in computer vision, including convolutional neural networks (CNNs), recurrent neural networks (RNNs), and generative adversarial networks (GANs).

The goal of this course is to help students grasp the basic theories and methods of computer vision and to develop their abilities in computer vision analysis and application.
currentCourses.name: 计算机视觉

currentCourses.chinese-intro: 本课程为可视计算与交互导论性课程。该课程的主要目的包括两个方面：首先，通过对可视计算与交互基本原理的介绍，使学生建立视觉思维（visual thinking），了解和掌握相关知识和基本方法；其次，通过对可视计算与交互最新进展的介绍，辅助以编程和工具实践方式，培养仿真模拟、可视化与视觉内容创作与智能交互等方面的专业素养与技能。
currentCourses.english-intro: This course provides introduction to Visual Computing and interaction, concerning with visual representation and creation, specifically, color and shape representation, visual simulation of natural environments with dynamic phenomena and behaviors, data visualization, and visual interactions. It covers fundamental knowledges in computer graphics, visualization, and computer vision. Teaching students both theoretical and practical aspects of the visual computing, we expect that students gain hands-on understanding where visual computing fits in to the workflow of a visual thinking, production and reasoning.
currentCourses.info: 任课老师希望能将上课教室安排在理教
currentCourses.name: 可视计算与交互概论

currentCourses.chinese-intro:
本课程介绍计算机视觉、人工智能在图像处理中的理论和应用，预期目标是让学生掌握图像处理基础的基本概念和原理，学习深度学习、计算机视觉基础，了解计算机视觉领域在图像处理方面的主要研究技术，熟练使用数字图像处理软件和工具并掌握其背后的技术原理，聚焦算法理论与代码实践，培养学生利用人工智能的思路解决图像处理问题的进阶能力，提升学生的创新思维和实践能力。

涵盖机器智能和计算机科学。

内容包括图像传感和采集、直方图处理、空间滤波、二维傅里叶变换、频域滤波、图像去噪、图像超分辨率重建、低光照图像增强、彩色图像处理、图像生成、图像风格化、图像转换、图像编辑等，并介绍最新的StyleGAN和扩散模型专题。
currentCourses.english-intro:
This course introduces the theory and application of computer vision and artificial intelligence in image processing. The expected goal is to enable students to gain the basic concepts and principles of image processing, learn deep learning and computer vision, understand the main research technologies in the field of computer vision in image processing, be proficient in using digital image processing software and tools and understand the technical principles behind them, cultivate students' ability to solve image processing problems with artificial intelligence ideas, and enhance students' innovative thinking and practical ability.

Covers machine intelligence and computer science.

Content includes image sensing and acquisition, histogram processing, spatial filtering, Fourier transformation, frequency domain filtering, image denoising, image super-resolution, low-light image enhancement, color image processing, image generation, image stylization, image translation, image editing, etc., and introduces the latest StyleGAN and diffusion model topics.
currentCourses.first-class: 可以零基础选课，但推荐以下先修课程：计算概论 程序设计实习，Python程序设计
currentCourses.name: 图像处理

currentCourses.chinese-intro: 本课程帮助学生建立对科研的基本认识和良好的科研素养，训练学生科研方法，了解智能领域前沿研究方向，为深入科研实践做准备。具体来讲，本课程将介绍科学研究的一些重要要素，培养创造性思维与批判性思维的能力，培养发现问题和解决问题的能力、方法和习惯，培养科技写作与交流的能力、时间管理能力等。同时，也介绍科研中所涉及的知识产权和科研道德规范。该课程还会对基本的科研编程工具作介绍，包括命令行、强大的文本编辑器的使用、使用版本控制系统提供的多种特性等常规课程可能忽略了的训练。最后，这门课还将介绍相关领域的前沿科研方向，并和潜在的科研导师及科研优秀学生交流。
currentCourses.english-intro: This course introduces research to sophomore year students, to give them an overview of what research is about, the creative and critical thinking involved, as well as the associated ethnical issues. We intend to provide guidance and training on basic research skills such as technical reading & writing, and presentation. We will also prepare students with hands-on tools that are helpful for programming developments involved in research, those that are not usually taught in regular courses. Finally, we will invite a group of research mentors to introduce their research fields and ongoing research, to help the students discover their research interests and connect with a potential research mentor.
currentCourses.info: 只限智班手动选课；任课老师希望将上课教室安排在理教
currentCourses.name: 智能科学研究实践I

currentCourses.chinese-intro: 本课程讲授机器学习基础理论，重点为泛化理论与核心算法。详细内容见课程大纲
currentCourses.english-intro: This course focuses on the fundamental theories of machine learning, with emphasis on the generalization theory and fundamental learning algorithms.
currentCourses.name: 机器学习

currentCourses.chinese-intro:
本课程内容主要分为三个部分：
   1. 底层：并行编程
   以CUDA为对象，讲解单机并行编程，预计同学们能够掌握并行计算原理、并行编程思想、并行计算模式，掌握并理解GPU并行计算在AI系统重要性。
   
   2. 中间层：脚本语言
   以Python为代表，讲解Python语言的基础知识以及深度学习系统Pytorch等，预计同学们通过编程实践体会脚本语言的灵活性，深入掌握Python高级技巧，能够用Python编写深度学习系统的中间层模块。
   
   3. 系统层：分布式
   讲解AI系统的多机协同，预计同学们能够掌握分布式系统的基本原理，比如跨机器协同计算、大模型训练的原理等。
currentCourses.english-intro:
The content of this course is mainly divided into three parts:

1. Parallel programming
Using the CUDA programming language,  the course explains single-machine parallel programming. It is expected that students will be able to understand parallel computing principles, parallel computing models, and understand the importance of GPU parallel computing in AI systems.

2. Script language
Taking Python as the representative, the course explains the basic knowledge of Python language and deep learning frameworks such as Pytorch. It is expected that students will learn the flexibility of script languages through programming practice, understand advanced Python techniques, and be able to write intermediate-layer modules for deep learning systems using Python.

3.  Distributed computing
The course explains the multi-machine collaboration of AI systems. It is expected that students will be able to grasp the basic principles of distributed systems, such as cross-machine collaborative computing, and the principles of large model training.
currentCourses.first-class: 人工智能引论、程序设计实习
currentCourses.name: 人工智能中的编程

currentCourses.name: 人工智能中的编程

currentCourses.chinese-intro:
培养学生掌握数据结构和算法的设计分析技术，提高程序设计的质量，根据所求解问题的性质选择合理的数据结构并对时间空间复杂性进行必要的控制。使得学生在将来的学习、研究和工作中，具备设计和实现高效的数据结构和算法的能力。
本课程方案的基本设计原则可以概括为以下三个方面：
（1）强调基础数据结构与算法的训练，从问题求解的角度，培养学生运用数据结构和算法基本理论来分析和解决问题的能力。
（2）注重实践能力和工程能力的培养，使得学生遵从软件开发的规范性，并建立起数据结构与算法设计和问题求解的知识体系。
主要的关注点，是数据知识与算法知识体系以及问题求解的计算思维能力。课程的重点：从广度和深度上把握数据结构与算法的知识体系，了解基本数据结构和经典算法，掌握理论、抽象和设计方法。课程的难点：问题抽象、算法抽象、数据结构抽象等数学抽象能力的培养；树和图结构中搜索和回溯思想；排序等算法的时空效率分析和权衡；检索和索引的效率；AVL、伸展树、红黑树等平衡树、B/B+树等数据结构中的平衡问题；根据实际问题，选择合适的数据模型，设计合适的算法，运用所学理论知识来求解；各种数据结构和算法在学科前沿中的应用和发展。
针对上述重点和难点，本课程从理论、抽象和设计的三个层次展开数据结构与算法教学，注重数据结构基本概念和抽象数据类型表述，使得学生可以在不同的设计阶段采用不同的抽象数据类型作为设计的基础，在适当的抽象层次上考虑程序的结构和算法。对每种数据结构都从其数学特性入手，先介绍其抽象数据类型；再讨论其不同的存储方法，与学生一起讨论研究不同存储实现下的可能算法；然后结合算法分析来讨论各种存储方法和算法的利弊，摒弃那些不适宜的方法。这样，充分调动学生主动学习的积极性，使得学生学到数据结构与算法所涉及的计算思维方法。
currentCourses.english-intro:
Understand principles and theories of Data Structures and Algorithms; complexity analysis and tradeoff, able to design and implement efficient and effective data structures and algorithms to solve problems.
Covers programming, data structures, and algorithm analysis. 
Topics include the organization and implementation of fundamental data structures such as list, binary tree, tree and forest, graph; the efficient sorting and searching algorithms; complexity analysis and tradeoff; data abstraction and problem solving.
currentCourses.name: 数据结构与算法 (A)

currentCourses.chinese-intro: 本课程主要面向智能方向的本科生，介绍计算机视觉的基本概念、方法和应用。计算机视觉是人工智能的一个重要分支，它的目标是使计算机具有“看”的能力，即从图像或视频中获取信息。本课程涉及的内容主要包含三个方面：第一部分介绍图像处理与特征提取的基本概念和方法，包括图像的基本操作、边缘检测、特征提取、特征匹配等；第二部分介绍三维重建与多视角几何的基本概念和方法，包括相机模型、立体视觉、三维重建等；第三部分介绍深度学习在计算机视觉中的应用，包括卷积神经网络、循环神经网络、生成对抗网络等。本课程旨在帮助学生掌握计算机视觉的基本理论和方法，培养学生的计算机视觉分析和应用能力。
currentCourses.english-intro:
This course is primarily intended for undergraduate students in the field of intelligence and introduces the fundamental concepts, methods, and applications of computer vision. Computer vision is an important branch of artificial intelligence, aiming to enable computers to "see"—that is, to extract information from images or videos.  

The course covers three main areas:

1. The first part introduces basic concepts and methods of image processing and feature extraction, including basic image operations, edge detection, feature extraction, and feature matching.
2. The second part covers the fundamentals of 3D reconstruction and multi-view geometry, including camera models, stereo vision, and 3D reconstruction.
3. The third part focuses on the application of deep learning in computer vision, including convolutional neural networks (CNNs), recurrent neural networks (RNNs), and generative adversarial networks (GANs).

The goal of this course is to help students grasp the basic theories and methods of computer vision and to develop their abilities in computer vision analysis and application.
currentCourses.name: 计算机视觉

currentCourses.chinese-intro: 本课程为可视计算与交互导论性课程。该课程的主要目的包括两个方面：首先，通过对可视计算与交互基本原理的介绍，使学生建立视觉思维（visual thinking），了解和掌握相关知识和基本方法；其次，通过对可视计算与交互最新进展的介绍，辅助以编程和工具实践方式，培养仿真模拟、可视化与视觉内容创作与智能交互等方面的专业素养与技能。
currentCourses.english-intro: This course provides introduction to Visual Computing and interaction, concerning with visual representation and creation, specifically, color and shape representation, visual simulation of natural environments with dynamic phenomena and behaviors, data visualization, and visual interactions. It covers fundamental knowledges in computer graphics, visualization, and computer vision. Teaching students both theoretical and practical aspects of the visual computing, we expect that students gain hands-on understanding where visual computing fits in to the workflow of a visual thinking, production and reasoning.
currentCourses.info: 任课老师希望能将上课教室安排在理教
currentCourses.name: 可视计算与交互概论

currentCourses.chinese-intro:
本课程介绍计算机视觉、人工智能在图像处理中的理论和应用，预期目标是让学生掌握图像处理基础的基本概念和原理，学习深度学习、计算机视觉基础，了解计算机视觉领域在图像处理方面的主要研究技术，熟练使用数字图像处理软件和工具并掌握其背后的技术原理，聚焦算法理论与代码实践，培养学生利用人工智能的思路解决图像处理问题的进阶能力，提升学生的创新思维和实践能力。

涵盖机器智能和计算机科学。

内容包括图像传感和采集、直方图处理、空间滤波、二维傅里叶变换、频域滤波、图像去噪、图像超分辨率重建、低光照图像增强、彩色图像处理、图像生成、图像风格化、图像转换、图像编辑等，并介绍最新的StyleGAN和扩散模型专题。
currentCourses.english-intro:
This course introduces the theory and application of computer vision and artificial intelligence in image processing. The expected goal is to enable students to gain the basic concepts and principles of image processing, learn deep learning and computer vision, understand the main research technologies in the field of computer vision in image processing, be proficient in using digital image processing software and tools and understand the technical principles behind them, cultivate students' ability to solve image processing problems with artificial intelligence ideas, and enhance students' innovative thinking and practical ability.

Covers machine intelligence and computer science.

Content includes image sensing and acquisition, histogram processing, spatial filtering, Fourier transformation, frequency domain filtering, image denoising, image super-resolution, low-light image enhancement, color image processing, image generation, image stylization, image translation, image editing, etc., and introduces the latest StyleGAN and diffusion model topics.
currentCourses.first-class: 可以零基础选课，但推荐以下先修课程：计算概论 程序设计实习，Python程序设计
currentCourses.name: 图像处理

currentCourses.chinese-intro: 本课程帮助学生建立对科研的基本认识和良好的科研素养，训练学生科研方法，了解智能领域前沿研究方向，为深入科研实践做准备。具体来讲，本课程将介绍科学研究的一些重要要素，培养创造性思维与批判性思维的能力，培养发现问题和解决问题的能力、方法和习惯，培养科技写作与交流的能力、时间管理能力等。同时，也介绍科研中所涉及的知识产权和科研道德规范。该课程还会对基本的科研编程工具作介绍，包括命令行、强大的文本编辑器的使用、使用版本控制系统提供的多种特性等常规课程可能忽略了的训练。最后，这门课还将介绍相关领域的前沿科研方向，并和潜在的科研导师及科研优秀学生交流。
currentCourses.english-intro: This course introduces research to sophomore year students, to give them an overview of what research is about, the creative and critical thinking involved, as well as the associated ethnical issues. We intend to provide guidance and training on basic research skills such as technical reading & writing, and presentation. We will also prepare students with hands-on tools that are helpful for programming developments involved in research, those that are not usually taught in regular courses. Finally, we will invite a group of research mentors to introduce their research fields and ongoing research, to help the students discover their research interests and connect with a potential research mentor.
currentCourses.info: 只限智班手动选课；任课老师希望将上课教室安排在理教
currentCourses.name: 智能科学研究实践I

currentCourses.chinese-intro: 本课程讲授机器学习基础理论，重点为泛化理论与核心算法。详细内容见课程大纲
currentCourses.english-intro: This course focuses on the fundamental theories of machine learning, with emphasis on the generalization theory and fundamental learning algorithms.
currentCourses.name: 机器学习

currentCourses.chinese-intro:
本课程内容主要分为三个部分：
   1. 底层：并行编程
   以CUDA为对象，讲解单机并行编程，预计同学们能够掌握并行计算原理、并行编程思想、并行计算模式，掌握并理解GPU并行计算在AI系统重要性。
   
   2. 中间层：脚本语言
   以Python为代表，讲解Python语言的基础知识以及深度学习系统Pytorch等，预计同学们通过编程实践体会脚本语言的灵活性，深入掌握Python高级技巧，能够用Python编写深度学习系统的中间层模块。
   
   3. 系统层：分布式
   讲解AI系统的多机协同，预计同学们能够掌握分布式系统的基本原理，比如跨机器协同计算、大模型训练的原理等。
currentCourses.english-intro:
The content of this course is mainly divided into three parts:

1. Parallel programming
Using the CUDA programming language,  the course explains single-machine parallel programming. It is expected that students will be able to understand parallel computing principles, parallel computing models, and understand the importance of GPU parallel computing in AI systems.

2. Script language
Taking Python as the representative, the course explains the basic knowledge of Python language and deep learning frameworks such as Pytorch. It is expected that students will learn the flexibility of script languages through programming practice, understand advanced Python techniques, and be able to write intermediate-layer modules for deep learning systems using Python.

3.  Distributed computing
The course explains the multi-machine collaboration of AI systems. It is expected that students will be able to grasp the basic principles of distributed systems, such as cross-machine collaborative computing, and the principles of large model training.
currentCourses.first-class: 人工智能引论、程序设计实习
currentCourses.name: 人工智能中的编程

favorites.chinese-intro:
培养学生掌握数据结构和算法的设计分析技术，提高程序设计的质量，根据所求解问题的性质选择合理的数据结构并对时间空间复杂性进行必要的控制。使得学生在将来的学习、研究和工作中，具备设计和实现高效的数据结构和算法的能力。

（2）注重实践能力和工程能力的培养，使得学生遵从软件开发的规范性，并建立起数据结构与算法设计和问题求解的知识体系。

favorites.english-intro:
Understand principles and theories of Data Structures and Algorithms; complexity analysis and tradeoff, able to design and implement efficient and effective data structures and algorithms to solve problems.
Covers programming, data structures, and algorithm analysis. 
Topics include the organization and implementation of fundamental data structures such as list, binary tree, tree and forest, graph; the efficient sorting and searching algorithms; complexity analysis and tradeoff; data abstraction and problem solving.
favorites.name: 数据结构与算法 (A)

courses.chinese-intro: 一、 课程定位：高等数学A（以下简称高数A）是面向对数学要求比较高的理科等专业的同学开设的一门重要的基础课。这里的“要求比较高”，是指在课程的理论、方法、计算和应用等方面有较高的要求（见后面的比较）。这里的“重要的基础课”是指后续的专业课中很有可能依赖于本课程的内容和方法。 二、 高数A在同类课（微积分类课程）难度链中的位置（由难到易）： 数学分析> 高数A> 高数B> 高数C> 高数D> 高数（D类基础） 三、 高数A的特点、与相关课程的比较、教学目的和要求： 高数旨在对微积分体系有一个整体的了解，着重培养学生的抽象思维能力、逻辑推理能力、基本的空间想象能力、一定的运算能力、应用所学知识分析问题和解决问题的能力。 四、 课时：为了便于比较，相关课程的学时如下：高数A两个学期，高数B和高数C两个学期，高数D和高数（D类基础）一个学期。 五、 难度：高数A要求理解思想和概念、掌握方法、领悟本质、熟练应用，高数C要求了解概念、懂得方法、明白现象、知道几个重要公式和结论，能够进行基本的计算。
courses.english-intro: This course is a preliminary but fundamental course for students from School of EECS (Electronics Engineering and Computer Science), School of Physics, etc. It is harder than “Advanced Mathematics B
courses.info: 习题课时间周二10-11节，三教303、三教505、三教305
courses.name: 高等数学A（一）

courses.chinese-intro: 本课程主要是高等数学A（一）的配套课程， 提供极限论与一元函数微分学基本习题的解题方法与技巧。 使得学生对高等数学A（一）的内容有深刻的认识与掌握。
courses.english-intro: This course is mainly for the students to master the knowledge of the course Advanced Mathematics A (no.1). It provides sufficient training for the students to solve problems in the theory of limit of sequences and functions as well as differential of functions of one variable.
courses.name: 高等数学A（一）习题

courses.chinese-intro: 本课程将学习线性方程组、行列式、矩阵、向量空间、矩阵的特征值和特征向量、二次型等内容，使学生初步掌握线性代数的基本理论、基本方法和基本技巧，培养学生科学思维和分析问题以及解决问题的能力。
courses.english-intro: The main contents of the course are system of linear equations, determinants, matrices, vector spaces, eigenvalues and eigenvectors of matrices, and quadratic forms. The students can grasp the basic theory, methods and techniques of linear algebra from the course. The course will educate the students scientific thinking and the ability for analysing and solving problems.
courses.info: 习题课时间双周周一10-11节，二教404、一教208、三教506，请注意最新上课教室
courses.name: 线性代数A (I)

courses.chinese-intro: 函数式程序设计是一种具有悠久历史的程序设计方法。在几十年以来的大多数时间中，函数式程序设计栖身于象牙塔内，慢慢成长，积蓄力量，并没有在软件开发实践中得到广泛使用。世异时移，这种情况正在发生变化。随着软件系统复杂性的不断提高以及软件与现实世界关系的日益紧密，如何严格确保软件系统的正确性和可靠性，逐渐成为一个重要的现实问题。函数式程序设计建立在严格的数学概念的基础上，具有良好的数学性质，为上述问题提供了一种现实可行的解决方案。目前，大多数的主流程序设计语言都在逐渐引入函数式程序设计的各种成分。本课程将系统介绍函数式程序设计的基本思想、核心概念、以及相关的程序设计方法和程序推理方法，为学生从事算法设计、程序语言设计、软件开发等领域的研究和实践工作建立坚实的理论基础。
courses.english-intro: Functional programming is a formal method for constructing software programs, which has a long history since 1950s. In most time of this long history, functional programming sheltered itself in the ivory tower, growing slowly and accumulating the strength. As a result, functional programming has not been widely used in software development practice. However, this situation is changing. With the growing complexity of software systems and the growing influence of these automated systems on human civilization, an important problem emerges: How to formally ensure the correctness and reliability of software systems. Functional programming builds on formal mathematical concepts, and functional programs possess good mathematical properties for reasoning and synthesis. Currently, most mainstream programming languages are enhancing themselves with various elements from functional programming. This course will give an introduction to the basic ideas and key concepts of functional programming, as well as functional methods for program construction, reasoning, and synthesis. Knowledge from this course will establish a solid foundation for students to do research and development work in algorithm design, programming language design, and software development.
courses.first-class: 1.学生最好已经学习过一种非函数式的主流程序设计语言（例如，C、C++、Java 等）。 2.如果不满足条件1，但确实对函数式程序设计语言感兴趣，那么，学生应在学习这门课程的同时，自学一种非函数式的程序设计语言。
courses.info: 习题课时间双周周一10-11节，二教404、一教208、三教506，请注意最新上课教室
courses.name: 计算概论A（实验班）

courses.chinese-intro: 此实验课是《计算概论A》的上机实习课，是程序设计课程的必要环节,有助于理解算法掌握编程方法。主要的教学目标是通过在线编程网格平台，实战编程训练，在助教的辅导下，完成《计算概论A》课堂讲授的内容，
courses.english-intro: Practicum is the essential process to the course of to help understanding the algorithm and programming method. The is carried out on a programming platform. Under the guidance teaching assistants, students can skill up their programming level.
courses.first-class: 大一新生课程，不需要先修课。
courses.name: 计算概论A上机实习课

courses.chinese-intro: 中国近现代史纲要课程，是中宣部和教育部规定的我国普通高校本科学生必修的一门思想政治理论课。该课主要讲授中国近代以来抵御外来侵略、争取民族独立、推翻反动统治、实现人民解放的历史，帮助学生了解国史、国情，使学生认识近现代中国社会发展和革命发展的历史进程及其内在规律，从而深刻领会人民为什么选择了马克思主义，选择了中国共产党，选择了社会主义道路。 本课程实行专题讲座，教师实行教学组式的组合方式，分成4个教学组；实行课程主持人、课堂主管教师、专题主讲教师和助教“四位一体”的教学管理方法。以课堂讲授为主，辅以其它实践性环节，其中包括播放文献纪录片或电影、写作心得体会、组织课堂讨论、参观展览或博物馆等。采取灵活宽松的考核方法。平时成绩40%，包括课堂讨论小论文，期末考试60%（开卷）。
courses.english-intro: The course of modern and contemporary history of China is a compulsory course of ideological and political theory for undergraduates, provided by The Central Propaganda Department and the Ministry of Education. This course focus on the history of Chinese people against foreign aggression, fighting for national independence, overthrowing the reactionary rule and achieving national liberation in modern China. It will help students understand the national history, the historical process and internal rules of the modern Chinese society and the revolution. By this way, they will deeply understand why people choose the Marxism, the Communist Party of China and the road of socialism. This course was set up by Peking University since September 2006 and it was named to the quality courses of Beijing and China in 2008. Credit score: 2. schedule type: 2 hours a week, optional during two semesters. level: freshmen required. This course use the form of seminars as teachers will be separated into four teams, include presenters, a competent teacher, lectures and teaching assistants. The teachers will give you some lectures, and the traits of the course is the practical parts, such as broadcasting documentaries or films, writing exercises about the films, class discussion, visiting the exhibitions and so on. The assessment of students is flexible. Final exams accounts for 60%, which is open-book examination, the rest 40% include individual performance and essays.
courses.name: 中国近现代史纲要

courses.chinese-intro: 本课程为本科一年级新生必修思想政治理论课，是一门融思想性、政治性、科学性、理论性、实践性于一体的思政课。帮助新时代大学生树立以马克思主义、社会主义和共产主义为基础的世界观、人生观、价值观、道德观、法治观，提高思想道德素质和法治素养，是聚焦人生理论、理想信念、价值观念、精神品格、道德觉悟、法治思维教育、引导大学生健康成长、立志成才、成长为自觉担当民族复兴大任时代新人的关键课程。
courses.english-intro: This course is designed to cultivate and train freshman to be a moral and political law-biding person who should carry his duty to the society and the country. This course belongs to one of the ideological and political courses, a compulsory course for all undergradutes in Chinese universities. The key contents of this course includes the world outlooks, life values, morality and law-biding qualities for young students.
courses.name: 思想道德与法治

courses.chinese-intro: 本课程为创新创业方法课，邀请信息科技领域知名企业家、技术专家和学者，分享解析科技创新企业真实案例。适用于多学科的本科及研究生。本课程旨在强化企业家精神和科技创新的感染力，启蒙学生创新创业意识，引导学生在科技大变革的背景下，思考加速技术转移转化、实现社会经济价值的原理与方法。
courses.english-intro: This course teaches methodologies on innovation and entrepreneurship. We will invite prestigious businessmen, technical experts and scholars in the field of information science and technology, to share and analyze real cases of technology enterprises. This course is suitable for undergraduates and graduate students in multiple disciplines. This course aims to strengthen the appeal of entrepreneurship and technology innovations, enlighten students' awareness of innovation and entrepreneurship, and guide students to think about the principles and methods of accelerating technology transfer, and realizing social and economic value in the context of technological revolution.
courses.name: 信息科学前沿与产业创新

courses.chinese-intro: 本课程将向学生介绍批判性思维与学术写作的要求与规则，关注文本分析、有效论证的建构以及证据和二手资料的使用，讲解写作的基本过程。 学生通过阅读各种文体的具有挑战性的材料以及写作从而强化其批判性思维的能力，提炼其修辞技能，写作过程中着重关注修改和文体风格。
courses.english-intro: This course introduces students to the demands and conventions of critical thinking and writing. It focuses on analyzing texts, building effective arguments, and using evidence and secondary source materials as well as the instruction on the stages of the writing process, from pre-writing exercises through rough drafts and revisions. Students enhance their critical thinking abilities by reading and writing challenging material, refine their rhetorical strategies, practice writing processes with special attention to revision and style, and write and read in a variety of genres. Their writing exercise includes formal and informal writing and preparing a final portfolio.
courses.name: 批判性思维与学术写作

courses.chinese-intro: 军事理论课是根据《普通高等学校军事理论课教学大纲》要求开设的北京大学大学一年级本科生的必修课，由人民武装部组织。每学年度上下学期都开课，每学期开4—6个教学班。主要教学内容为：我国国防、军事思想、军事形势、军事高科技、军兵种知识，高技术战争等14--15个课题，主要由中国人民解放军国防大学老师讲授。
courses.english-intro: The Military Theory Course is a mandatory course for the first-year undergraduate students of the Peking University, as required by the Syllabus for the Military Theoretical Courses of Common Colleges and Universities and organized by the People's Armed Forces. There are classes for each semester of the academic year, and 4-6 classes per semester. The main teaching content are: 14--15 topics such as China's national defense, military ideology, military situation, military high-tech, military arms knowledge, and high-tech warfare, which are mainly taught by the teachers of the National University of Defense Technology.
courses.name: 军事理论
courses.unit: 学生工作部人民武装部

courses.chinese-intro: 本课程属讲座课，主要由信息科学技术学院各主要研究方向的知名教授讲授信息科学技术各个学科方向的发展历史、发展现状、相关领域基础知识以及发展趋势等方面的内容。同学通过课程的学习能够对信息科学技术领域包含的各个学科、各个领域有一个整体的、全面的了解；使学生对计算机软件、计算机体系结构、计算机理论、纳米电子学、量子电子学、通讯技术、微电子学、智能科学等学科门类有一个比较明确的概念。
courses.english-intro: This course is a lecture class. Several well-known professors from school of electronics engineering and computer science Peking University are responsible for the particular subjects. The subjects include introduction of information technology, computer software, computer architecture, computer network and information system, computer theory, computational linguistics and machine translation, wireless communication, optical communication, physical electronics and nanotechnology, quantum electronics and laser sciences, microelectronic devices and technology, system on a chip, micro-electromechanical systems, machine perception, and multi-media process. Through this course, students can overview all the information technology and clear the road map of the IT field.
courses.name: 信息科学技术概论
